title: Fisticuffs over free-kicks and bust-ups at yoga - when team-mates clashed
description: Fifteen years after one of the most shocking moments in Premier League history, BBC Sport takes a look at some other on-pitch bust-ups involving team-mates.
content:
Lee Bowyer and Kieron Dyer were sent off for fighting each other on 2 April, 2005
You can't always get on with everyone in your workplace.
Admittedly, with many of us working from home at the moment, it is not really an issue but generally speaking there is… [+4835 chars]
